channel.title: Need help with server but i have vary limmited computer knowledge
channel.description: i want mi friend to be in mi world wit me... 1 q... how??? :confused:

item.title: Need help with server but i have vary limmited computer knowledge
item.dc:creator: @pancholip pancholip
item.description:
@pancholip wrote:

dont use hamachi… just use moparscape its easier. just download moparscape and go to new ip and type in the server ip. make sure your friend does that too and then you’ll be in the same server

item.title: Need help with server but i have vary limmited computer knowledge
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

ok heres what you do , you have hamachi right? well on hamachi go to the button right next to the power off/on button and click create network enter a name and a pass then tell your friend the network name and pass so he can join the network.Once your friends joined the network you must have the server up and running and you will also have to tell him the ip above your name on hamachi.Ok so your friend will load up moparscape let it load then he will go to file new server and he will enetr your ip that you gave him that is above your name on hamachi.Then all he has to do is log in , he can make up a name and pass i advise you to tell him not to use his real rs pass.Hope it helps if u get the server up ill try to join the server.

Read full topic
